# Module: tf.contrib.learn.learn_runner



Defined in [`tensorflow/contrib/learn/python/learn/learn_runner_lib.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.4/tensorflow/contrib/learn/python/learn/learn_runner_lib.py).

Utilities to run and tune an Experiment.


## Functions

[`run(...)`](../../../tf/contrib/learn/learn_runner/run): Make and run an experiment.

[`tune(...)`](../../../tf/contrib/learn/learn_runner/tune): Tune an experiment with hyper-parameters.
